choices.text:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for seven days.  My restrictions are dairy, garlic, honey, almonds, pistachios, and cashews
Here's your healthy meal plan for the next seven days with all the recipes included. Please note that this is just a sample menu to give you an idea of how to create balanced meals within your dietary restrictions. You can make adjustments based on personal preferences and availability of ingredients.

Day 1:
- Breakfast: Oatmeal with banana, blueberries, and almond milk
- Lunch: Tofu scramble with veggies (bell peppers, mushrooms) and quinoa
- Dinner: Vegan pizza with cauliflower crust, marinara sauce, roasted vegetables, and cashew cheese

Day 2:
- Breakfast: Oatmeal with banana, blueberries, and almond milk
- Lunch: Chickpea salad (chickpeas, tomatoes, cucumbers) on a bed of mixed greens
- Dinner: Vegan enchiladas with corn tortillas, black beans, roasted vegetables, and salsa

Day 3:
- Breakfast: Oatmeal with banana, blueberries, and almond milk
- Lunch: Chickpea salad (chickpeas, tomatoes, cucumbers) on a bed of mixed greens
- Dinner: Vegan baked potato with steamed broccoli, roasted cauliflower, and marinara sauce
